text:
@morningmika @realDonaldTrump Just the facts- @NYGovCuomo put Covid-19 patients in nursing homes killing over 6,000 people. He is bragging about how great he did.
Just the facts- rioters/terrorists are looting,burning down businesses and attacking people daily and you call them "peaceful".  #TruthMatters
